title: Did Barack Obama express opposition to "undiscovered, undocumented and unverified migration "?
subtitle: A 13-year-old quote from former Senator Illinois was re-inserted in the general debate in the context of President Donald Tramp's "Intolerance" policy.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2005, Senator Barack Obama expressed opposition to "undiscovered, undocumented and unrestricted migration."
